name: Plane Crashing Test Simulator 3D
description:
Welcome to the Plane Crashing Test Simulator 3D game! Control the air plane, make it run into various dangerous obstacles and check how long it could perform flight! If you’re addicted to different car or motor bike crash test simulators, you’ll find this game really good!
Check your crashing skills performing different tricks and stunts, try not to avoid any obstacles – they’re making your money! Enjoy the flight crashing into different walls, buildings and other interesting things, which are leading your plane to a total demolition! Unleash your fury and destroy one of these massive flying machines!
Be really mobile not to fit into any turn and gain more damage points! Control your plane and watch it destructing bit by bit! Earn points for each successfully crashed plane and unlock new dangerous obstacles, locations and wonderful modern planes to destroy! Check your crashing skills, complete the mission and have fun playing Plane Crashing Test Simulator 3D!
Become a crash tester of these huge and massive machines, do your best and ruin them all! Power-up your mobility and acceleration characteristics to become faster and crash your wonderful plane quicker than it even possible!
Plane Crashing Test Simulator 3D features:
• Realistic plane crash test simulator
• Various types of different planes and obstacles
• Chance to crash huge vehicle
• Addictive gameplay
Take part in the crash test of various planes! Do your best and gain the maximal damage! Become the best crash tester ever and have fun playing Plane Crashing Test Simulator 3D!
